靤字的基本解释

靤
pào
古同“皰”，面疮。

靤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bào］
［《廣韻》防教切，去效，並。］
(1)同“皰”。面疮。
(2)水泡。

靤字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【面字部】　靤； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1383第23
【廣韻】防敎切【集韻】皮敎切，?音骲。【玉篇】面瘡也。　又【集韻】本作皰。面生气也。亦作䶌疱。◎按廣韻靤訓面瘡，皰訓面生气，二字分見。集韻合靤皰爲一，專訓面生气，非。

靤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
靤字的起名意思

暂无。

靤
Basic explanation of words
靤
pào
Gu Tong "blister", facial sores.
靤
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bào］
["Guangyun" guards against teaching cuts, eliminates effects, and merges. ]
(1) Same as "blister". Facial sores.
(2) Blisters.
靤
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Face Character Department】　靤; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1383 Page 23
[Guang Yun] Anti-cutting [Ji Yun] Cut the skin, and the sound. [Jade articles] Facial sores also.　 [Ji Yun] This is a blister. The face is angry too. Also known as blister. ◎According to Guangyun Tiaoxun facial sore, bleb training face is angry, see the two characters separately. The combination of rhyme and blister is one, special training face is angry, not.
靤
